title: ENOUGH!: 43rd Brigade wants US to take back its people
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The youth wing of the 43rd Brigade protested in front of the US Embassy today and demanded for the country to recall its citizens, who are currently ruling Sri Lanka.

Karunaratne Paranavithana of the 43rd Brigade, speaking to News 1st stated that they are not angry with the American people, however Sri Lanka has suffered greatly due to the actions of despicable rulers, and the USA has awarded such despicable rulers citizenship, therefore must recall them back to their own country.
“Take those Americans back to their countries. This is the voice of the people of Sri Lanka,” he said.
43 youths of the 43rd Brigade marched from Moratuwa to Colombo Fort today (25) under the theme ‘Let us stay in our country, let’s go and drive them out together’.
A woman who was participating in the protest demanded as to what would become of their children while the country grapples with fuel and gas shortages as of present.
